title: Big events are back!
description:
Sports! Festivals! Concerts! After an 18-month hiatus, these big events (and more) are expected to return to — and possibly exceed — their pre-pandemic glory. Recode’s senior data reporter Rani Molla explains how the event ecosystem is healing. 
Episode by: 


Hosts: Adam Estes (@adamclarkestes)


Producer: Taylor Maycan (@taylormaycan)


Engineer: Paul Mounsey 


Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
